trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs> class provides the data needed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs>類別會提供所需的資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>事件。

trans-unit.source: Custom authentication schemes for a Web site use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to indicate whether a user's login attempt succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 供網站使用自訂驗證配置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>屬性，表示使用者的登入嘗試是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs> class to pass data to a custom authentication method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs>類別將資料傳遞至自訂驗證方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs" /> class with the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated" /> property set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs" /> 屬性設定成 <see langword="false" /> 來初始化 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is authenticated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者已經驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a user's authentication attempt succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者的驗證嘗試是否成功。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the authentication attempt succeeded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證嘗試成功，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property in custom authentication schemes implemented in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler to indicate the success or failure of the user's login attempt.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>中實作自訂驗證配置屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件處理常式，以指示成功或失敗之使用者的登入嘗試。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to `false` indicates that the Web site user has not presented valid credentials and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control should raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginError> event in addition to displaying text that indicates the login attempt was not successful.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>屬性`false`指出網站使用者不具有呈現有效的認證和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項應該引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginError>除了顯示的文字表示的登入嘗試事件不成功。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginError> event enables the page developer to have additional processes or action occur when user authentication is not successful.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginError>事件可讓網頁開發人員有其他處理程序或使用者驗證不成功時，會發生的動作。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to `true` indicates that the user has presented valid credentials and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control should raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event and redirect the user back to the current page or to the page indicated by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>至`true`表示使用者已提供有效的認證和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項應該引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>事件並返回目前頁面或頁面的使用者所指定的重新導向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property with a custom authentication scheme to indicate the success or failure of a user's login attempt.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>屬性與自訂驗證配置，表示成功或失敗的使用者的登入嘗試。
